item.title: Linear Regression for Machine Learning
item.description: Introduction Linear Regression is one of the basic concept used in Machine Learning. Do not think it’s complex as it’s related to Machine Learning. You have studied linear regression and even used without knowing it all your life. Linear regression is a simple statistics technique that predicts the value of an output variable(response) based on one or more input input(predictor) variables. At the end of performing linear regression we will have a linear relationship (a mathematical formula) between the input variable(s) and the response variable.
